statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND activity_description LIKE '%login%';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE user_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'refund';
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 500 AND user_id = 200;
